{{Lang|'''Bubu Pharmacy'''|zh=不卜庐|zh_rm=Bùbǔ-lú|zh_tl=Not-Divining Hut}} is a [[shop]] within the city of [[Liyue Harbor]]. The stock of items aside from the recipe refreshes every 3 days.

Bubu Pharmacy is renowned as the "finest pharmacy in all of [[Liyue]]". The pharmacy is known to be quite busy during and after the [[Lantern Rite]].

The Viewpoint for Yujing Terrace can be found on the roof of the pharmacy.

==Trivia==
===NPC Mentions===
*[[Moli]] sarcastically suggests [[Holderlin]] to visit the pharmacy to cure his hallucinations.
*An ad about the Bubu Pharmacy can be seen at the [[Qingce Village Bulletin Board]].

===Etymology===
* {{Lang|Bùbǔ|zh=不卜}} literally means "not divining" or "not practicing fortune-telling." This could suggest that the pharmacy's medicines and practices are based on modern scientific methods rather than folk beliefs.
* On the other hand, as an idiom, ''bùbǔ'' can mean {{Lang|"unpredictable"|zh=难料}}.<ref>Zdic.net: [https://www.zdic.net/hans/%E4%B8%8D%E5%8D%9C 《汉典》不卜]</ref>
** During the Archon Quest [[Farewell, Archaic Lord]], [[Paimon]] cites the Liyue proverb "All things are random, and... so how are you supposed to predict anything?" in the pharmacy.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Guizhong (Archon Quest)}}</ref> This may be a reference to Bubu Pharmacy's name.
